title: Computation of Zolotarev rational functions
authors: Lloyd N. Trefethen and Heather D. Wilber
abstract:
An algorithm is presented to compute Zolotarev rational functions, that is,
rational functions $r_n^*$ of a given degree that are as small as possible on
one set $E\subseteq\complex\cup\{\infty\}$ relative to their size on another
set $F\subseteq\complex\cup\{\infty\}$ (the third Zolotarev problem). Along the
way we also approximate the sign function relative to $E$ and $F$ (the fourth
Zolotarev problem).
